entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
